text: ee sandaha awasthawa me rate janathawa udakarala denawa.
ape haminetath parana kar kattak aran dunnanam undage transport elawans labeyida kiyala hoyala balanna oona.
dan pol wendesiyen pol ganne kiyatada maithri asuweya.
me athara thama shri lankawa thula wenama rajyayak godanagima sandaha kisidu sahayak ho ekangathawayak laba nodena bawa wigneshwaran mahatha pasugiyada prakasha kara thibina.

oya paththe aawa dawasaka ama nangiwa ekkan yannam tharangayak balanna.

//oya kiyana sathkara tika thaman balaporoththu wena hasbandla karanne barapathala waraddak// na na mama blog balabala law karannawath jiwath wennawath purudu wechcha kenek newe.mama siriyas kiyana than waladi siriyas kiyanawa ehema nathi than waladi mewage.sthuthiyi obe adahas dakwimata.

yehowa dewi dun balaporoththuda dan bonda wi atha.+ ז [shayin] 19 inna hitinna thanak nathuwa ma asarana wi sitina bawa sihi karanna.+ ma aaharayata ganne thiththa ha wisha de bawath sihi karanna.+ 20 oba mawa sihi kara, ma wethata pamina mage dukata pihita wana bawa mata sthiraya.+ 21 mema karanaya mama sihiye thabagena+ oba mata pihita wana thek iwasiliwanthawa bala sitimi.+ ח [cheth] 22 yehowa dewiyani, ape pana rakune+ obe athimahath premaya* oba apata penwu nisaya.+ oba apata penwana dayawa kedinakawath nima nowanneya.+ 23 oba sama udasanakama obe dayawa penwannehiya.+ obe wishwasawanthakama athimahathya.+ 24 “mage ekama urumaya yehowa dewiya.+ eheyin mama ohu kerehi iwasiliwanthawa bala sitimi”+ kiya mama sithagaththemi.
usawi yamata pawa katayuthu karanu atha.
habayi, dilindu samaja kotas wala pidanaya wadiwima awadanama ihalayamata hethuwak.*

andiris ude balana wita gurunnanse penennata natha.nandagen wimasu wita aya hada walape.kihipa deneku ekkara gath ohu kalawa pira gurunnanse soyamin palu gal guhawa desata gaman kalaya.awasanaye siyalla wisadi atha.ohunta gal guhawen hamu wuye gurunnansege dina kihipayakata pera miya gos athi mala sirurath adunakuth beheth warga kihipayakuthya.wisheshama deya wuye guhawa thula thibi hamuwunu ran manika awasana warata ada siti le perunu adumya.eda udenis maruthurulata yawwe ran manikage pilliya bawa andiris pasuwa dana gaththaya.adunath manthara pothath gath andiris siyaluma wedana thaniwama daragena gurunnansege awasana katayuthu itu kalaya.
me kathawama thawa tikak digata liyannath puluwan kama thiyenawa.
ee athin baluwama jeppo aayojanaya karalath na paribhojanaya karalath na..
mokakda me karanne.
me nisa adhyapana aayathanayak se peradeniya wishwa widyalayata ape pawul athara wishesha gaurawayak wiya.

nathnam atharin pathara kathawunu em.
oyala danne eka bandumkarayayi ne..
